# identifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for a game session.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Accessing Information About a Game Session

- **lastModifiedDate**: The date that the game session was last modified.
- **lastModifiedPlayer**: The last player to modify the game session.
- **maxNumberOfConnectedPlayers**: The maximum number of players allowed to connect to the game session at the same time.
- **owner**: A player object that represents the owner of the game session.
- **players**: An array of player objects associated with the game session.
- **title**: The title of the game session.
